Platforms.notes:
This platform allows your previously added homekit accessories to now work with Alexa
To get started, please create an account here:  https://homebridge.cloudwatch.net
 Next add the "homebridge" skill to your amazon alexa and sign in using the same credentials
Finally enter those same credentials below and add the accesssory. Once complete ask Alexa to "Find Devices" 

Note: Alexa does not handle multiple homes. So if you plan on setting up an Alexa in multiple homes, please ensure that your Alexas are registered under different accounts and you sign up with an alternate email
Platforms.credits: This add on was created by NorthernMan54, more info can be found on their github: https://github.com/NorthernMan54/homebridge-alexa
